data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Tarapacá, Chile that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tarapacá, Chile
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, move the 55,020 believers in the state of Tarapacá to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Tarapacá, Chile.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Tarapacá, Chile.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Turk people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord we pray you unite the 55,020 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Tarapacá.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 153,226 people in the state of Tarapacá who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 55,020 believers in the state of Tarapacá to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
